UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Antimicrobial Peptides from a Cecropin-Like Region of Heteroscorpine-1 from Heterometrus laoticus Venom with Membrane Disruption Activity.
Literature.Author: Erviana R, Saengkun Y, Rungsa P, Jangpromma N, Tippayawat P, Klaynongsruang S
